EmailTemplate.name: PRH Iconic Account Notification For Deletion
EmailTemplate.subject: Le Cercle Iconic Account deletion request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Le Cercle support team,
A deletion request has been done for this iconic account: {!PRH_Luxury_Accounts__c.Name} ({!PRH_Luxury_Accounts__c.Link}). Please proceed with the suppression of the account and its associated records as soon as possible.
Many thanks,
Le Cercle team
